MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G33 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:02am. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Langdale Street substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:12am on Saturday 6th February 2021.
